headline: FICO Announces Availability of FICO Score Mortgage Simulator for Lender Use
summary: BOZEMAN, Mont., March 10, 2025--Global analytics software leader FICO (NYSE: FICO) announces that the innovative FICO® Score Mortgage Simulator is now available for lender use through Xactus, a fintech and market leader in verification solutions for the mortgage industry and the largest credit reseller. Mortgage professionals can leverage valuable insight from the simulator to help drive smarter decisions that can present more loan options and favorable interest rates for customers.
